string.name: don_t_have_an_account_sign_up_now
string.u: Don\'t have an account? Sign up now

resources.string: Enter your registered mobile number and email below:
Q1. How much is your delivery fee?

A1. Our delivery fee starts at Rs.29 within the first kilometer of driving distance from the merchant to your location, with an additional Rs.2 per kilometer for the next 4 kilometers, and Rs.5 per kilometer for the 6th to the 20th kilometer. For example: 3 kilometers = Rs.33, 5 kilometers = Rs.37, 7 kilometers = Rs.47, 10 kilometers = Rs.62. A small order fee of Rs.10 will apply for a food bill less than Rs.200.
Q2. What are your payment methods?
A2. You can pay via credit card, debit card, net banking, online wallets like PayTm, PayPal, GooglePay, or you can simply opt for Cash on Delivery.
Q3. How will my order be delivered?

A3. Orders will be delivered as per the delivery details mentioned while ordering your product. Our delivery personnel will reach out to you in the promised time/SLA. Please write to khazanaassist@khazana.in if the product is not delivered by the promised time.
A4. KHAzANA is accepting orders 24/7 but the shops may differ from day to night as most restaurants have their own open and close timings.
Q5. How much can I order at once?
A5. There is no upper limit on how much you can order at once but the minimum cart value should be Rs.100 and for no order fee should be Rs.200.
